document.full_text: matt holliday's hot start to the major league baseball season came to a screeching halt as the st. louis cardinals outfielder had an appendectomy on friday, the team said.
document.title: cardinals outfielder holliday out after appendectomy
lines_and_colors: matt holliday's hot start to the major league baseball season came to a screeching halt as the st. louis cardinals outfielder had an appendectomy on friday, the team said.
